data.title: Alec Guinness: 5-film collection
data.meta_description:
Kind hearts and coronets: Following his mother's death, an Edwardian gentleman plots to avenge her by seizing the dukedom of the aristocratic d'Ascoyne family.
The captain's paradise: The captain of an international ferryboat secretly enjoys one wife in Gibraltar and another in Tangier.
The ladykillers: A band of vicious bank robbers rent a room from an elderly widow.
The Lavender Hill mob: A bank clerk devises a plot to steal a fortune in gold from his own bank.
The man in the white suit: An eccentric chemist one day invents a fiber that never wrinkles, wears out or gets dirty.
data.meta_site_name: St. Johns County Public Library System
data.text:
The Hastings Branch Library is closed for approximately one month to relocate to the W.E. Harris Community Center, located at 400 E. Harris St., on Tuesday, Sept. 3. This move is a necessary step in the planned construction of a new community center and library, which St. Johns County anticipates opening in Fall 2025. For more information about this closure please visit the Hastings closure page on our website.

Due to scheduled maintenance, the catalog will experience downtime between approximately 1 and 5 p.m. on Wednesday, Aug. 14. For assistance with searching for library materials, please call your local branch library or speak to a staff member. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
